name: Drive Safe
description:
In this game, you control 3 cars at once!

Controls

  • Left car: R (turn left) & T (turn right)
  • Middle car: H (turn left) & J (turn right)
  • Right car: I (turn left) & O (turn right)

Test your hand-eye coordination and reflexes as you try to avoid obstacles in 3 different lanes! The more cars you have alive, the higher the multiplier is for your score! This game is endless, so try to get the highest score you possibly can!

Link to GitHub repo: https://github.com/H4RT4N/Drive-Safe/tree/master/FinalBuild
